org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.user

Class SnapshotNeighborhoodFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.user.SnapshotNeighborhoodFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, NeighborhoodFinder

    @Shareable
@DefaultProvider(value=SnapshotNeighborhoodFinder.Builder.class)
public class SnapshotNeighborhoodFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements NeighborhoodFinder, java.io.Serializable
    A neighborhood finder that has a snapshot of the rating data for efficiency. This is built by backing a SimpleNeighborhoodFinder with a BinaryRatingDAO.
    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Long2ObjectMap<? extends java.util.Collection<Neighbor>> findNeighbors(UserHistory<? extends Event> user, LongSet items)
      Find neighboring users for particular items.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • findNeighbors

        public Long2ObjectMap<? extends java.util.Collection<Neighbor>> findNeighbors(@Nonnull
                                                                     UserHistory<? extends Event> user,
                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                     LongSet items)
        Description copied from interface: NeighborhoodFinder
        Find neighboring users for particular items. user and the returned rating vectors are unnormalized. Any normalization used by the neighborhood finder is only for comparing neighbors.
        Specified by:
        findNeighbors in interface NeighborhoodFinder
        Parameters:
        user - The user's event history.
        items - The items we're trying to recommend, or null to get get neighborhoods for all possible items.
        Returns:
        A map from item IDs to user neighborhoods for all items for which we can find neighboring users.
